Disconnect the mains adapter from the mains socket immediately.
立即將電源連線由插座中拔除。
Do not store or keep any electrical equipment<t2/> <t3/>in places where it could fall into the bathtub<t4/> <t5/>or washbasin.
請勿將電器設備置於可能掉落浴缸或洗臉盆處。

重要資訊！
Important recommendations concerning your<t0/> <t1/>health
關於你健康之重要建議

此舉將使保固失效且可能造成嚴重危險（火災、觸電、受傷）。
Only have repairs carried out by <t2/>authorized<t3/> service points.
僅由授權服務句點進行維修。

保留以供未來使用！

Should<t0/> <t1/>you<t2/> <t3/>give<t4/> <t5/>this device to another person, it is vital that<t6/> <t7/>you<t8/> <t9/>also<t10/> <t11/>pass<t12/> <t13/>on these instructions for use.

The device is not<t27/> <t28/>intended for commercial<t29/> <t30/>use.
此裝置非用於商業用途。
Then let the appliance<t2/> <t3/>cool down<t4/> <t5/>for at least 30 minutes<t6/> <t7/>before<t8/> <t9/>using it again.
於下次使用前需使裝置至少冷卻 30 分鐘。
Then switch off the unit for at least half an hour and allow it to cool down.
並於使用至少關閉裝置半小時以冷卻裝置。

To ensure<t6/> <t7/>that<t8/> <t9/>your <t10/>MEDISANA AC 850<t11/> <t12/>provides successful results for a long time, we recommend that<t13/> <t14/>you read carefully through the following notes<t15/> <t16/>on its use and care.
為確保您的 MEDISANA AC 850 能長久正使用，建議仔細閱讀以下使用及維護之注意事項。
Use of the<t0/> <t1/>massage device is prohibited in the<t2/> <t3/>following cases:
以下人員及情況下禁止使用按摩裝置：
WARNING
警告
You have acquired a quality product<t0/> <t1/>with your purchase<t2/> <t3/>of the cellulite manager unit from <t4/>MEDISANA<t5/>.
當您向 MEDISANA 購買脂肪按摩器，您獲得了高品質的產品。

• <t0/>Only<t1/> <t2/>use<t3/> <t4/>this<t5/> <t6/>unit<t7/> <t8/>according<t9/> <t10/>to<t11/> <t12/>the<t13/> <t14/>intended purpose<t15/> <t16/>and<t17/> <t18/>as<t19/> <t20/>directed<t21/> <t22/>in<t23/> <t24/>the<t25/> <t26/>instruction manual.
•僅依此裝置設計之功能使用，並遵循說明手冊之指示。

• Before connecting the device to your power<t0/> <t1/>supply, please ensure<t2/> <t3/>that<t4/> <t5/>the supply voltage stated<t6/> <t7/>on the rating plate is compatible<t8/> <t9/>with your mains supply.
• 將裝置連接電源前，請先確認供應電壓與額定電壓相符。
• Children must be supervised to ensure<t0/> <t1/>that<t2/> <t3/>they do not play with the device.
• 請確保不讓幼童操作裝置。
• Consult your doctor first before using this unit if you have diabetes or other related illnesses.
• 糖尿病或相關疾病患者使用前請先諮詢醫師。
• Do not attempt<t0/> <t1/>to repair the unit yourself in the event of any defects.
• 當裝置故障時請勿嘗試自行修理，
• Do not reach for the unit if it has fallen into water.
• 若設備掉落水中請勿觸摸，
• Do not use any electrical equipment<t0/> <t1/>while in the bath or shower.
• 請勿於沐浴或淋浴時使用任何電氣設備。
• Do not use the device in the vicinity of aerosol <t0/>vapor<t1/> or at the same time as an oxygen device.
• 請勿於接近蒸氣處或與氧氣裝置同時使用設備。
• Do not use the device underneath bedding<t0/> <t1/>or cushions.
• 請勿於床下或墊子下使用裝置。

• If the<t0/> <t1/>power<t2/> <t3/>supply cable,<t4/> <t5/>respectively the<t6/> <t7/>mains adaptor is damaged, it may only be replaced<t8/> <t9/>by<t10/> <t11/>MEDISANA, an <t12/>authorized<t13/> dealer or by qualified personnel.
• 若電源線或變壓器損壞，僅能由 MEDISANA 授權經銷商或合格人員更換。
• If you place too much strain on the appliance,<t0/> <t1/>it will be switched off by a thermal fuse.
• 若施加於裝置之壓力過大，其溫度保險絲將切斷裝置運行。
• Keep the mains cable away from hot surfaces and naked flames.
• 使主電源線遠離熱源或火焰。.
• Keep the power<t0/> <t1/>cable away from the rotating<t2/> <t3/>massage<t4/> <t5/>rollers.
• 使電源線遠離旋轉按摩滾輪。
• Massages<t0/> <t1/>using the<t2/> <t3/>cellulite massager<t4/> <t5/>are not<t6/> <t7/>a substitute for treatments administered by doctors or physiotherapists.
• 使用橘皮組織按摩器按摩並不能取代醫師或物理治療師所進行之療程。
• Never carry, pull or rotate the unit by the mains cable and never pinch or crush the cable between<t0/> <t1/>other objects.
• 請勿以電源線移動、拉扯或旋轉裝置，且勿使其他物體夾住或撞擊電源線。

• Never use the unit if the power cable has been<t0/> <t1/>damaged,<t2/> <t3/>the mains adapter<t4/> <t5/>is defective, if the unit does not work perfectly, if it has fallen into water or has been damage.
• 當電源線受損、變壓器故障、裝置不正常運作、裝置掉落水中或受損時請勿使用。
• Only pull the plug out of the socket when you have dry hands, when the unit has been switched off and is not being used any longer, and also do this when you have to replace or clean the heads.
• 當裝置以關機且不使用時、或需更換或清潔時拔除插頭，拔除插頭時請保持手部乾燥。
• Only use the unit in enclosed<t0/> <t1/>spaces!
• 裝置僅適用於室內！
• The treatment should be pleasant.<t0/> <t1/>Stop at once and consult your doctor if you feel pain or the treatment seems unpleasant.
• 療程應相當舒適，若您感覺疼痛或有任何不適請立即停止使用並向醫師諮詢。
• The warranty is null and void if it is not used for the intended<t0/> <t1/>purpose.
• 不正確使用裝置將使保固失效。

• This device is not designed<t0/> <t1/>to be used by persons (including children) with limited physical, sensory or mental<t2/> <t3/>abilities,<t4/> <t5/>or<t6/> <t7/>by<t8/> <t9/>persons<t10/> <t11/>with<t12/> <t13/>insufficient<t14/> <t15/>experience<t16/> <t17/>and/or<t18/> <t19/>knowledge,<t20/> <t21/>unless<t22/> <t23/>under observation<t24/> <t25/>by a person<t26/> <t27/>responsible<t28/> <t29/>for their safety, or unless they have been<t30/> <t31/>instructed<t32/> <t33/>in the use of the device.
• 此裝置設計不適用於身體、感官或精神狀態異常之人員（包含幼童），或不具有充足經驗及知識之人員，除非有能負責其安全之人員在旁協助或指導使用裝置。
• Uninterrupted treatment should not last longer than 15 minutes.
• 連續使用勿超過 15 分鐘，
• do not treat any parts of the body that have swellings, burns, inflammation, peeling skin, wounds or other sensitive points,
• 請勿用於身體上任何腫脹、燒傷、發炎、脫皮、傷口或其他敏感的部份，
• not while ingesting<t0/> <t1/>substances<t2/> <t3/>that<t4/> <t5/>reduce<t6/> <t7/>reaction<t8/> <t9/>times (e.g. painkiller medications, alcohol),
• 使用降低身體反應時間之藥物或食物時（例如：止痛藥、酒精），
• on children,<t0/> <t1/>• on animals,<t2/> <t3/>• you are pregnant, • on the head<t4/> <t5/>and the throat,
• 幼童， • 動物， • 孕婦， • 頭部及咽喉，
• people<t0/> <t1/>fitted with a pacemaker, artificial joints or electronic implants should in all cases consult a doctor before using the device,
• 裝有心律調整器、人工關節或電子式植入裝置之人員使用裝置前需向醫師諮詢，

• you should not use this device if you are affected<t0/> <t1/>by one or more of the following illnesses and conditions:<t2/> <t3/>Circulation disorders,<t4/> <t5/>varicose veins, open<t6/> <t7/>wounds, bruises, broken<t8/> <t9/>skin, inflammation<t10/> <t11/>of the veins or thrombosis.
•若有以下一種或多種疾病時請勿使用裝置：循環系統疾病、靜脈曲張、開放性傷口、瘀傷、皮膚炎、 靜脈炎或血管栓塞。
